title: Auth Bypass in Test Platform
description: Discovered Authentication bypass via parameter manipulation affecting Test Platform. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanisms and access restricted functionality.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
proof_of_concept:

Payload: See steps

This demonstrates Authentication bypass via parameter manipulation

# Validation at 2025-11-05T22:39:44.037741
Validation successful with alternative payload at 2025-11-05T22:39:44.037738
remediation: Review authentication logic thoroughly. Implement multi-factor authentication. Use secure session management and properly validate all authentication tokens.
